Container.Name: docker-status-mqtt-homeassistant
Container.Overview: Monitor your Docker containers and integrate them with Home Assistant via MQTT. This container publishes the status of your Docker containers to an MQTT broker, allowing you to monitor and control them through Home Assistant switches. Supports both local Docker socket access and remote SSH connections.

Config.Name: MQTT_SERVER
Config.Description: IP address or hostname of the MQTT broker

Config.Name: SSH_HOST
Config.Description: IP address or hostname of the remote Docker server (optional, for SSH mode)

Config.Name: SSH_PORT
Config.Description: SSH port of the remote Docker server

Config.Name: PUBLISH_INTERVAL
Config.Description: Interval in seconds for publishing container statuses

Config.Name: INCLUDE_ONLY
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of container names to monitor (optional). If specified, only these containers will be monitored.

Config.Name: EXCLUDE_ONLY
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of container names to exclude from monitoring (optional). Cannot be used with INCLUDE_ONLY.
